journalEntries.longForm: Built a webpage about the Belcourt Theatre and learned an intro to Git.

journalEntries.conceptsCovered: Finished and presented first group project
journalEntries.longForm: Matt C, Tyler, Cooper, & I finished our CSS/HTML project about Ricky Gervais.
Practiced javascript functions and objects with an example about the pope blessing Bryan and getting older.
Finished the API project - teamed up with Dustin, Matt B & Michael. Presented it to Andy.
Finished Daily Journal 8 & 9 - it now can add and delete entries, and filter entries by mood.

Completed the edit data feature for Daily Journal 10. Added a scroll to top feature when the edit button is clicked. Created another feature that adds the appropriate cartoon figure to each entry based on mood. Got detailed with the styling, particularly the sizing/spacing of elements in the output boxes.
Refactored json file in Daily Journal to create separate related data arrays for mood and added instructor as well. Worked the image creator feature based on mood and instructor chosen.
